mapper.select: select u.user_id userId,u.username,u.dept_id deptId,u.email,u.mobile, u.status,u.ssex,ur.role_id roleId,u.name,u.seat_number seatNumber from tb_yofishdk_auth_user u left join tb_yofishdk_auth_user_role ur on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}
select listagg(role_id,',') within group (order by role_id) as role_ids from tb_yofishdk_auth_user_role where user_id = #{userId}
